title: New: Erik Jonasson – Like A Funeral (Joel Rampage Duet Remake)
content:
Loved the original of this track, so was slightly wary when I saw that there was a ‘remix’ of sorts – however it’s not your conventional, run of the mill, rework; instead Joel Rampage (of Postiljonen) turns Erik Jonasson’s Like A Funeral into an epic, soaring number, including the addition of vocals from Mia of Postiljonen.

Pretty beautiful, life-affirming stuff. Check it out below.

Like this? Follow our On Repeat Playlist for a handpicked selection of the very best in new music; updated weekly.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
